thread.title: Even If You are Not Drunk, This Wacky Bar In Berlin Will Make You Consider You Are
thread.title_full: Even If You are Not Drunk, This Wacky Bar In Berlin Will Make You Consider You Are | Breaking News & Headlines

author: Graham Finley
title: Even If You are Not Drunk, This Wacky Bar In Berlin Will Make You Consider You Are
text:
Possibilities are that you do not ordinarily have the spins walking into a bar (if you do, you could want to rethink your life possibilities), but you will certainly feel them in this German bar — even if you happen to be sober.
That’s mainly because Madame Claude, a definitely distinctive hangout spot in Berlin, is decorated in a way that intentionally disorients you. Yelp reviewers describe it as a “quirky labyrinth.” Why? Due to the fact all of the furniture, plush chairs, and cute tables are set up in a totally ridiculous (and absolutely awesome) way.
Attempt to figure out what’s going on right here. Madame Claude
Hint: it is the orientation of the photo.
All of the furnishings is affixed to the ceiling, producing it seem like the whole constructing is upside down. Madame Claude
It appears like a fairly uncomplicated idea, but it makes the nighttime spot exceptional and memorable. Madame Claude
And there is no finish to the hilarious photo opportunities. Madame Claude
Apart from becoming a bar, Madame Claude is also a neighborhood entertainment hub. Madame Claude
Madame Claude
Each time you look at an image, you have to assume about exactly where specifically you are in the space. Madame Claude
Not a lot of other bars can boast that kind of disorientation — specially when people aren’t even drunk but.
(via Lost At E Minor)
The bar does have some significantly less bizarre components, which includes the stage, the table-tennis setup, and the bar itself. Even in a spot like this, you have to have a little practicality! Discover much more about this quirky locale on their web page, and verify out what shoppers have to say on Yelp.
